channel.title: Add knowledge on
channel.description: Recent content in Add knowledge on

item.title: How to Add Knowledge
item.description: Overview # This tutorial takes a deep dive into the different features to add information to your knowledge-based agent. We will guide you through every single step of the feature, and we will also highlight some key takeaways along the way. Prerequisites # By now, you should already have a SeaChat agent ready to receive new knowledge. If you have not created an agent, we kindly advise you to refer to our comprehensive tutorial on how to create an agent.

item.title: Spreadsheet Upload
item.description: Overview # SeaChat provides many methods to upload files to your agent. We will focus on the Upload Spreadsheet method in this tutorial and by the end of the tutorial your SeaChat agent will have a customized knowledge base at your service. Create a SeaChat Agent # If you don’t have a SeaChat account yet, you can sign up for free at SeaChat website! You can find all the information you need to create a knowledge-based AI agent in Create an Agent.

item.title: Audio/Video Knowledge Base
item.description: Overview # Audio and video files can be used as knowledge base for your SeaChat agent too! Usually one would first transcribe these files to text, then upload the text documents to AI agent’s knowledge base. SeaChat takes care of the transcription step for you by directly accepting audio/video files! SeaChat provides many methods to upload files to your agent. We will focus on the Transcribe Audio/Video method in this tutorial.
